property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played by X-Pac, Lita, Rob Van Dam, or Tajiri, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after the card titled From the Top Rope. When successfully played, discard 1 card from your hand. As an action, you may discard this card and draw a card. Doing this will cause no damage to opponent, and the Fortitude Value for this Action is F: 0.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver or the card titled Throw Opponent Out of the Ring. Discard any number of cards and your opponent discards the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card if your Superstar card indicates you may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts. As a maneuver, can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver or the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. As a reversal, can reverse the cards titled Superplex or From the Top Rope. When successfully played, opponent must choose 2 cards from his hand and place them on top of his Arsenal. This card is -7F if played by the Dudley Boyz or Edge and Christian.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver. If reversed from opponent's hand, reveal your hand to your opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your next card played this turn is a maneuver with a Stun Value, your opponent's reversal to it is +5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If reversed from opponent's hand, you can either draw 1 card or remove any Action card from your opponent's Ring area and put it into his Ringside pile. When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, discard # cards and put # non-Maneuver cards from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. # cannot be greater than 3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played Grapple maneuver. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash. When successfully played, randomly choose 1 card from opponent's hand, and place that card on top of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after the cards titled Roll Out of the Ring, Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, Over the Top Rope, Airplane Spin, Giant Swing or after a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. As a reversal, can reverse the cards titled Suicide Plancha, or Flying TopT. When successfully played, you may shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by the Brothers of Destruction. If this card is the first non-Pre-match card played by any player in the game, it cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 3D or greater maneuver. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash. When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card. If your next card played this turn says it must or can only be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle you may disregard that text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If reversed from your opponent's hand, he discards 2 cards. When successfully played, you may put 1 Action card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played by Chris Jericho, you may discard 3 cards when playing this card and this maneuver cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, must be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. As a reversal, can reverse the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, if your Fortitude Rating is at least 20F greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, or if the Stun Value in your Ring area is at least 5 greater than the Stun Value in your opponent's Ring area, you win the game via Pinfall victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card if your Superstar card indicates you may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts. When successfully played, choose any 1 card in your Ringside pile and place it in your Arsenal. You may search your Arsenal for any 1 Action card, show it to opponent, place it into your hand and then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played after a successfully played 8D or greater maneuver. When successfully played by Chris Jericho or Raven, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you must put 1 card from your hand on top of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Workin' on the Knee and put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. If your next card played this turn is titled Workin' on the Knee, it cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand or Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. The cards titled Maintain Hold and Apply Illegal Leverage cannot be played immediately after this card. As a reversal, when played from your hand, reverse any Submission maneuver (including the card titled Clutch onto Opponent) and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver and cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash. When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Guillotine Stretch and put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed by the card titled Clean Break. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash. As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. As a reversal, can reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, you cannot play actions from your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by The Rock. As an action, discard this card, shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal that are not titled Iron Will. Draw 1 card. As a reversal, if overturned from your Arsenal, reverse the cards titled Sleeper, Claw, Clutch Onto Opponent, Apply Illegal Leverage, Indian Deathlock, Test of Strength and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique Mid-match Maneuver or non-unique Mid-match Action card, or any card with 'J.R.'in the title being played by your opponent. It is unsuccessful, goes to his Ringside pile, has no effect and ends his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Opponent names a card. Reveal the top card of his Arsenal. If it is the card he named, it goes into his hand. Otherwise, that card and the next 2 cards are overturned from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn the top card of your Arsenal into your Ringside pile. You may reveal up to the top X cards of your Arsenal, where X is the overturned card's printed Fortitude Value. Place any one of those cards into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Place any 1 Foreign Object card from your Ringside pile into your hand. If played by The Dudley Boyz, Buh-Buh Ray Dudley, or D-Von Dudley, you may instead place up to 2 Foreign Object cards from your ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if there is a Pre-match Stipulation card in a player's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, no player may search his Arsenal and put a card(s) into his hand, unless it is via his Superstar ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal. You may choose to put them in any order on top of your Arsenal, or shuffle your Arsenal. Then look at opponent's hand. You may choose to let him keep that hand, or else he shuffles it back into his Arsenal and redraws the same number of cards. Finally, look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Arsenal. You may choose to put them in any order on top of his Arsenal, or shuffle his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, you must discard 3 cards from your hand to your Ringside pile. Draw up to 3 cards. As a reversal, if played from your hand, reverse any Maneuver or Action card played by opponent that would allow him to draw more than 1 card this turn. If played as a reversal by Edge and Christian or Edge, you can reverse any Maneuver or Action card played by opponent that would allow him to draw 1 or more cards this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if you cannot play any Title Belt except the Tag Team Title Belts or if this is a Tag Team format match. Reversal cards to your next maneuver played this turn are +#F, where # is equal to your Fortitude Rating, or discard this card and draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, put 1 Grapple maneuver from your Ringside pile into your hand. If your next card played this turn is a Grapple maneuver, your opponent's Reversal card to it is +10F. As a reversal, reverse the card titled Gut Wrench and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards 1 card. At the beginning of your next turn, your first card played is considered to be played after the card titled Gut Wrench. If it is a Grapple maneuver, your opponent's Reversal card is +15F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must discard 1 card from your hand, unless you are the Hardy Boyz, Matt Hardy, Jeff Hardy, or Lita. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver of 6D or less, it cannot be reversed. Unless the next card played after that maneuver this turn is a High Risk maneuver, you must discard your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Name a card, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card you named, and your opponent discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put 1 non-unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Your opponent may put 1 non-unique card from his Ringside pile into his hand. When this card is in your Ring area, ignore the word 'face' in the text of the cards titled Kissing Up to the Stinkin' Fans.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, the text on on the card titled Disqualification now reads as such: Reverse any HEEL Action, Maneuver, or Reversal card if that opponent has 3 or more HEEL cards in his Ring area. Opponent is Disqualified and you win the game. This effect happens even if the card titled Disqualification is placed into your Ringside pile while overturning or applying damage from a HEEL Action, Maneuver or Reversal card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played against Triple H, Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley, or Vince McMahon. Opponent overturns cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile equal to the total number of Face cards he has in his Ring area plus his total Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if opponent has a Pre-match Title Belt card in his Ring area and you do not have a Pre-match Title Belt card in your Ring area. Place any Pre-match Title Belt card into opponent's Ringside pile; then that opponent must discard 2 cards or allow you to draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Everybody Wants (and Needs) a ... Snow Job?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played against Al Snow. If played by Al Snow, this card cannot be reversed. You must discard 3 cards from your hand. Look at opponent's hand. Draw cards up to the total Stun Value in opponent's Ring area or force opponent to place all cards with Stun Value in his Ring area and hand into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put the top card of your Arsenal into your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put it in your Ringside pile and if your next maneuver played this turn is a Grapple maneuver it is +4D, and cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled No Chance in Hell! Choose one: You may shuffle a number of cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of FACE or HEEL cards in your Ring area, or your opponent must overturn a number of cards equal to the number of FACE or HEEL cards in his Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you win via a Count Out Victory condition.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, whenever your hand must be revealed to an opponent, you may place 1 card from your hand underneath it, face down. You may look at, or return, any card underneath this card to your hand at any time. If this card is removed from play return all cards underneath it to your hand. You may place this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any HEEL Action card played by your opponent, and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, you may place up to 2 cards from your hand face down underneath it. These cards can be played, as if they are being played from your hand. If this card is removed from the Ring area, then all cards underneath it are placed into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by The Rock. Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. As an action, count the number of cards in your hand, and discard them all. Then shuffle an equal number of cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, if played from your hand, can reverse any type of maneuver but you must first discard your hand. End your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Place any ACTION card in your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Chyna, Two Man Power Trip and Brothers of Destruction do not draw any cards via this card. You may draw up to a number of cards equal to your total individual Superstar Value, plus the total Stun Value in your Ring area. All other players may draw a number of cards up to their total individual Superstar Value. After all players have drawn their cards, all players discard a number of cards equal to their total individual Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played against Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley. This card can only be played if the total Stun Value in your Ring area is greater than the Stun Value in your opponent's Ring area. Search your Arsenal for up to 3 Superstar Specific cards, show them to your opponent, and place them in your hand. Then shuffle your Arsenal and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by The Two Man Power Trip or The Rock. Search your Arsenal for a Trademark Finisher, show it to your opponent, place it in your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play the card titled When You Thought You Had All the Answers... if the total Stun Value in your Ring area is greater than the Stun Value in your opponent's Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must discard 1 card, overturn 2 cards, and end your turn. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your opponent may discard the card titled Step Aside. If he does not, he discards 5 cards and overturns 10 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, your maneuver cards cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand. If your Fortitude Rating is less than or equal to your opponent's Fortitude Rating, you must place this card in your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the card titled Study the Tapes is in your Ring area. You must take the top 3 cards from your Arsenal and put them into your Ringside pile. You may play 2 Mid-match cards to your Ring area over the maximum allowed. This card cannot be removed from your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent has a card titled Fans Love an Underdog in his Ring area, place it into his Ringside pile. At the end of the Pre-match phase, if you and your opponent have the same total Superstar Value, you go first; unless you both have Slandered Online in your Ring area or your opponent is the Superstar, Edge.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must take the top 2 cards from your Arsenal and put them into your Ringside pile. At the end of the Pre-match phase, if opponent does not have a Face card in his Ring area, his Superstar Value is - X while this card is in your Ring area, where X is equal to your total Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cuts your Arsenal to reveal a card; he must overturn cards equal to the Damage Value on the card he revealed, to a maximum of 15 D, and place them in his Ringside pile. Shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card cannot be removed from your Ring area. All Foreign Object cards and all Run-In cards played by all players are - 3F. The cards titled Disqualification! and Hebner Calls It, cannot be played by any player. Disqualification! has no effect when overturned from any player's Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Superstar Value is + 1. You can play the card titled Spectacular Ring Entrance even if your opponent started the game, if it is the first card played on your first turn. If you have the card Here a Mark, There a Mark, Everywhere a Mark Mark... in your Ring area, as a Mid-match action, you may place Personal Appearance into your Ringside pile and look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal. You may either arrange them in any order and place them back on top of your Arsenal or shuffle them into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent does not have a Pre-match Heel card in his Ring area, his Superstar Value is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must take the top 3 cards from your Arsenal and put them into your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, you may play 1 Pre-match card over the maximum allowed. If a player is about to win the game by a card played to his Ring area that specifies a Victory Condition on it, even if it cannot be reversed, his opponent may discard their entire hand and end the current turn. The game continues.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 3 cards. This card is not affected by the card titled Hell in a Cell Match. Once during each player's turn, that player may discard 1 card and then put 1 Foreign Object from his Ringside pile into his hand. When the card titled Dem Damn Dudleyz! is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns, you may also discard 1 card and then put 1 Foreign Object from your Ring area into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play 1 Pre-match card and 1 Mid-match card to your Ring area over the maximum allowed. Any player wins via a Pin Victory condition, if he has the cards titled Touch Turnbuckle #1, Touch Turnbuckle #2, Touch Turnbuckle #3, and Touch Turnbuckle #4 all in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Run-in cards cannot be played and no card or card effect can move any number of cards from any Ringside pile. Cards with the Chris Jericho, Kane, Mankind, Rock, Stone Cold Steve Austin, Triple H, Undertaker, Kurt Angle, Cactus Jack, Deadman Inc, or Shawn Michaels logos are not affected by this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Any player discards 1 card in order to play a non-Set-up Action card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and either: ignore the Permanent trait on the card titled Hell in a Cell Match and put it from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile or, if you are about to lose the game via Count Out Victory, shuffle up to 8 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and end the current turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack this card if your Superstar card indicates you may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts and your opponent's Superstar card does not. At the end of the Pre-match phase, your opponent must choose one: Play the entire game with his hand face up on the table, Overturn 10 cards from his Arsenal, or The maximum number of Mid-match cards allowed in his Ring area is reduced by 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When the card titled V.K.M.'s Patented Big Gulp is in your Ring area, you may place this card in your Ringside pile and your opponent must discard a number of cards from his hand to equal the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your opponent is modifying your Reversal cards. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your Reversal cards are unaffected by Fortitude modification for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Your next card played this turn is -#F, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played against Shane McMahon and cannot be played by The Rock. Reverse any Run-in card and end your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card. If played by Shane McMahon, you may draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, you may place any card with the words 'touch turnbuckle'in the title in your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile and end your turn. As a reversal, can reverse any card with the words 'touch turnbuckle'in the title, and end opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, any player must overturn the top 5 cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile whenever the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle is successfully played against him. Then place this card in your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if the card titled Hell in a Cell Match is in any player's Ring area. Can reverse the card titled Suicide Plancha or any maneuver card immediately played after the cards titled Roll Out of the Ring, Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, or Over the Top Rope and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the card titled Four Corners Match is in your Ring area, you successfully reversed a maneuver from your hand to end your opponent's turn and this card is the first card played on your turn. You may take 2 cards from your Ringside pile and shuffle them back into your Arsenal. If this card is put in your Ringside pile, instead place it into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the card titled Four Corners Match is in your Ring area, after a successfully played maneuver, and your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. You may draw 1 card. If this card is put in your Ringside pile, instead place it into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the card titled Four Corners Match is in your Ring area, if the last two cards you played this turn were successfully played maneuvers, and if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. You may play 1 Mid-match card to your Ring area over the maximum allowed. If this card is put in your Ringside pile, instead place it into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the card titled Four Corners Match is in your Ring area and if you discard 3 Reversal cards from your hand. You may remove any 1 maneuver card in your opponent's Ring area and place it into his Ringside pile. If this card is put in your Ringside pile, instead place it into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver, or the card titled Jockeying for Position. Your next card can be played as if this card were titled Throw Opponent Out of the Ring. Cannot be reversed by the card titled Just Bring It! As a reversal, can reverse the card titled Jockeying for Position, end opponent's turn. When successfully played choose one: opponent must discard 3 cards or put the top 6 cards of his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Chyna or Christian. Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent chooses to end his turn without playing a maneuver this turn, that player must put one maneuver card in his Ring area into his Ringside pile. If your Fortitude Rating is equal to or greater than your opponent's then you must place this card in your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When this card is in your Ring area, before damage has been applied from a card successfully played by your opponent, you can discard any number of cards and reduce the damage by 2 for each card discarded.

card.name: Happy You're Here, Happier You're Gone

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, whenever Chris Jericho discards a card for his Superstar ability, his opponent must discard 2 cards instead of 1; whenever Chyna discards a card for her Superstar ability, she must discard an additional card of her choice. If your opponent is Chyna, this card is -5F and it cannot be removed from your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed from opponent's hand. You may discard any number of cards, face down, from your hand. Then your opponent may discard any number of cards face down from his hand. Both players then reveal their discarded cards and the player that has discarded the greater total Fortitude Value wins the Test of Strength; if tied, nothing occurs. If you win, apply damage; if your opponent wins, you take damage and end your turn. # = The total Fortitude Value of the cards the winner discarded minus the Fortitude Value of the cards the loser discarded. Read as 0 in your Ring area. The card titled Apply Illegal Leverage cannot be played after this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the last two cards you played this turn have a Stun Value, make note of opponent this card is played against. Opponent must discard 4 random cards. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent must randomly discard 1 card at the start of each of his turns.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Discard 2 cards in order to play a maneuver, unless it is your first maneuver played of the turn. Your opponent's Grapple maneuvers played do no more than a maximum of 3D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and if your next card played from your hand this turn is a Strike or Grapple maneuver, it is +5D. When it is not reversed from your opponent's hand, draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. Must be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card and your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If your first card played on your next turn is a maneuver, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack Grapple maneuvers of 4D or greater. Your cards titled Drop Kick are F:0. Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 card and search your Arsenal for 1 card with the words 'dropkick' or 'drop kick' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When your Fortitude Rating is greater than his Fortitude Rating, your maneuvers are -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver. This card is +3D for each card with the word 'Hurricanrana' or 'Moonsault' in the title in your Ring area. As a reversal, reverse the card titled From the Top Rope and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1: your next card played this turn cannot be reversed, shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, or draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 2D or greater maneuver. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. As a maneuver, this card is +3D for each card with the words 'dropkick' or 'drop kick' in the title in your Ring area. As a reversal, reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from your hand, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. The maneuver goes in your opponent's Ring area, blank its text until the end of the turn, and overturn the normal damage, regardless of overturned Reversal cards. Then shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, where # is equal to the reversed maneuver's Damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards titled Chair Shot are not Heel cards. Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 Strike or High Risk Maneuver card and if your next card played this turn is a Strike or High Risk maneuver, it is -#F, where # is equal to the discarded maneuver's Fortitude. The maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver and if you discard the card titled Chair Shot. As a reversal, reverse the card titled Chair Shot and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Action card, 1 non-unique Maneuver card, and 1 non-unique Reversal card, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and randomly discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled When You Thought You Had All the Answers... Can be reversed by the cards titled Roll Out of the Way or Lift a Boot. Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver or if this is the first card played of your turn and you reversed a High Risk maneuver to end your opponent's last turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. When successfully played, look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 2 cards, and your opponent discards the chosen cards. If the card titled Chair Shot or Ladder in the Ring is in any Ring area, choose up to 4 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. Cannot be played after the card titled From the Top Rope. Can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver or if this is the first card played of your turn and you reversed a maneuver from your hand to end your opponent's last turn. You may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your cards titled Don't Hate da Playa, Hate da Game! are -3F. Once during each of your turns, before your Draw Segment, when your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, put up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You must discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, draw 3 cards or search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. That maneuver goes into his Ring area, blank its text until the end of the turn, and overturn cards equal to the maneuver's Damage. If your first card played during your next turn is the card titled Booker's Scissor Kick or Spinning T Kick, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, reveal your hand to your opponent and your next card played this turn cannot be reversed. As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver or if this is the first card played of your turn and you played the card titled Spinnerooni to end your opponent's last turn. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, cannot be reversed when played after the cards titled Irish Whip or Spinnerooni, draw 2 cards or your opponent discards 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All your cards played from your hand are +1D.Your Arsenal may not contain any Action cards. You may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your next card played this turn is a maneuver card it cannot be reversed. Whenever you successfully play a maneuver, you may then look at your opponent's hand OR draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, if played from your hand can reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, if played from your hand can reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, opponent's reversal to your next card played this turn is +10F. As a reversal, if played from your hand can reverse any Submission maneuver but you must first discard 1 card from your hand. End your opponent's turn

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, opponent's reversal to your next card played this turn is +10F. As a reversal, if played from your hand can reverse any High Risk maneuver but you must first discard 1 card from your hand. End your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack Grapple or Submission maneuvers of 4D or greater. You cannot pack Set-up cards except the card titled From the Top Rope. Draw up to an additional 2 cards during your Draw Segment. The maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 2 unless you have the card titled Pound 4 Pound in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled When You Thought You Had All the Answers... As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. As a reversal, reverse any Grapple maneuver or Trademark Finisher and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +#F, where # is equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw up to # cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if your opponent is Molly Holly, Crash Holly, or Hardcore Holly. Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Overturn 8 cards and you may discard up to 2 cards. Reduce the overturn by 4 for each card discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, can only be played when you have 3 or more cards in your hand. Discard 2 cards. As a reversal, reverse the card titled Roll Out of the Ring or From the Top Rope and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, your opponent discards 3 cards and overturns 3 cards, and you may search your Arsenal for 1 Foreign Object, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Commission-er Rules!, Great Technical Knowledge, Who Booked This Match?, Charismatic Style, Drawing Extra Heat, or Apply Illegal Leverage, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your cards titled Brass 'Nuks' Shot are -3F. You may shuffle in 12 cards instead of 8 when you Activate the card titled Duchess of Queensbury Rules.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, if your next card played this turn is the card titled Maintain Hold, you can ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text. As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile, he shuffles his hand into his Arsenal, draws the same number of cards, and skips his next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse the card titled Offer Handshake or any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and your opponent discards 1 card. As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a maneuver, you must take the top card of your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside pile. When your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver, or if this is the first card played on your turn after having reversed a maneuver from your hand to end your opponent's last turn. As a reversal, if played from your hand can reverse any Grapple maneuver or the card titled Back Body Drop but you must first discard 1 card. End opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, if opponent successfully plays a Maneuver or Action card from his hand, he must then discard a card.

card.name: What About Me? What About Raven?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If played from your hand, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for any Action card, reveal it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Strike, Grapple or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. You may draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by the Two Man Power Trip. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile, look at your opponent's Backlash deck, choose 1 non-Reversal card, and he discards the chosen card. When the card titled DTA is in your Ring area, instead choose any card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, your opponent chooses Action or Reversal, and then overturns cards until a card of the chosen type is overturned. That card is removed from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's maneuvers are not affected by any damage modifiers that would increase damage

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your next card played this turn is -10F or your opponent's Reversal cards to it are +10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by the Two Man Power Trip. When this card is in your Ring area, if you have 4 or fewer cards in your hand, your opponent's Superstar Ability is blank. If this card is put into your Ringside pile from your Ring area, draw up to 4 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent overturns 6 cards. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers are +2D.

card.name: Would You Please ... Shut the Hell Up!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent randomly discards for your Superstar Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if more than 1 copy of the card titled Gettin' Cheeky with It! is in your Ring area. Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is +5D for each card titled Ankle Lock in your Ring area and if your next card played this turn is the card titled Maintain Hold, you can ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text. As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver or any maneuver with the word 'kick' in the title and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, his Maneuver cards are +13F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If any player successfully plays the card titled Maintain Hold after a maneuver of 10D or greater, he wins via Pinfall victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, discard 3 cards from your hand and your opponent must take the top 10 cards of his Arsenal and put them into his Ringside pile. As a reversal, can reverse any Trademark Finisher. Opponent must take the top 5 cards of his Arsenal and put them into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, you may discard this card to either draw 2 cards from your Arsenal or to place any card from your Ringside pile into your hand. Doing this will not cause any damage to opponent, and the Fortitude Value for this Action is 0F. As a reversal, you can reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley, D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1. When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is 10 or greater, as a Mid-match Action, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and your opponent's Reversal card to your next card played this turn is +10F. When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is 15 or greater, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 2 or more cards in your hand, unless your Superstar is Edge. Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Discard 2 cards.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Hardy Boyz, Matt Hardy, Jeff Hardy

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. You must discard 1 card and if your next card played this turn is a maneuver of 7D or less, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, Edge and Christian, Hardy Boyz

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card cannot be removed from your Ring area. At the end of the Pre-match phase, all players may take up to 6 cards titled Table! Table! Table!, Ladder in the Ring, or Chair Shot remove them from their Arsenal and place them in their Backlash deck. These cards may now be played as if they were Mid-match Backlash cards but are not counted as such in your Ring area or your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card cannot be removed from your Ring area. At the end of the Pre-match phase, name a single Raw Deal card title. The named card cannot be played during the game by any player.
